attributes.action: Create a set of stamps celebrating Downing Streets Choef Mouser - Larry the cat!
attributes.background: Every year there are many special stamps celebrating pop stars, rock legends and forces of nature.  Larry the Cat is a living legend of Downing Street amd deserves hos own range of stamps

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about stamp design are a matter for Royal Mail, not the UK Government or Parliament.
